title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, embed, list, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user) packaged as a Docker container.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) for chatting, pulling, and switching Ollama models interactively.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama + ChromaDB to chat with local documents.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and delete models from JVM applications.

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, generation, embeddings, and streaming via async enumerables.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CI) module that spins up Ollama containers for pipeline-based LLM testing and evaluation.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes using Ollama, with templating support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that exposes Ollama models via Slack slash commands and app mentions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-nextjs
summary: Next.js starter template with server-side streaming chat using Ollama and Vercel AI SDK.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React; chat, manage, and benchmark models.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 GPU instances with model pre-loading.
